front.title: Configuration of Tunnel Mode Ipsec Endpoint Parameters

abstract.t: This document describes the assignment of configuration parameters to IPsec tunnel mode client endpoints. Single user computers that are connecting into corporations via Internet Service Providers, ISP's, using Tunnel mode IPsec may need to have configuration information supplied to them, such as inner ip address, DNS server addresses, WINS server addresses, etc. This document describes a method utilized by New Oak Communications to pass these parameters between it's Extranet Access Switch and it's IPsec client software.
